p: Among the 8,413 confirmed infections with SARS-CoV-2 in South Korea as of March 18, 2020 ( 23), 87 (1.03%) were between 0 and 9 years, and 438 (5.2%) were in the age group 10 to 19 years; none died. The proportion of patients 19 years or less with confirmed COVID-19 (6.2%) was much less than the proportion of the country's population as reported by the local statistics bureau (18%; 9,315,774 among 51,629,512).
